Package exception

Provides all the user-made Exceptions used in this program.

See:

Exception Summary

FunctionNotPresentException  
InvalidInputFileException  
LengthMismatchException  
NodeTypeException The edges of Factor Graph are meant from a NodeFunction to a NodeVariable.
NodeVariableNotInMapException  
OutOfAgentNumberException  
OutOfNodeFunctionNumberException  
OutOfNodeNumberException  
OutOfNodeVariableNumberException  
ParameterNotFoundException Exception thrown if you're looking for a variable in a function that doesn't have it as its parameter.
PostServiceNotSetException  
ReceiverNullException  
SenderNullException  
ValueNotSetException If the value of an instance (its utility function) is called and at least one of its variables is not set.
VariableNotSetException  
WeightNotSetException
